NAME: csN
LONG_DESC: Number of callers supporting the variant.

NAME: mergeAc
LONG_DESC: Number of samples with this call.

NAME: mergeSamp
LONG_DESC: Comma-separated list of samples supporting this call.

NAME: contigSupport
LONG_DESC: Number of SMRT-SV contigs with the SV.

NAME: contigDepth
LONG_DESC: Number of SMRT-SV contigs covering the SV locus.

NAME: sample
LONG_DESC: TEMP - Should be removed by the datatable code (fixed, remove this line when tables are re-built)

NAME: genotypeQualAlt
LONG_DESC: Sum of quality of the alternate observations.
